GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/users/:username.description: serves an object of requested user's details

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an array of a requested article's details

article.author: butter_bridge
article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: updates the vote count by sending a body: {inc_votes: newVote(example newVote = 10)}

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: posts a new comment to the specified article

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: get all comments back from the requested article

PATCH /api/comments/:comment_id.description: updates the vote count by sending a body: {inc_votes: newVote(example newVote = 10)}

comment.author: butter_bridge
comment.body: Oh, I've got compassion running out of my nose, pal! I'm the Sultan of Sentiment!

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.exampleResponse: no response, just a 204 status sent back
